data.title: Powerbeats Pro are the Bluetooth earbuds to beat
data.text: Let’s get the bad out of the way first, shall we? For starters, that charging case is huge.

data.title: All-Star Analyst Sees Apple's Stock As A Smart Buy
data.text: Jim Kelleher is the director of research at Argus Research; he is a CFA charterholder and a three-time winner in The Wall Street Journal's Best on the Street All-Star Analyst Survey. The tech expert provides an in-depth review of Apple (AAPL), following the firm’s second quarter earnings report.

data.title: Apple Stock Likely to Be Hurt by Trade Conflict
data.text: Apple stock will show a bearish trend as  tariffs and rhetoric increase between U.S. and China, creating problems for AAPL stock.

data.title: These 6 Giants Control Half the Global Video Game Market
data.text: If you're looking to invest in the growing popularity of video games, you might want to start by considering these sector winners.

data.title: Everybody complains Apple isn't innovating, but R&D spending and patents tell a different story
data.text: The amount of money going into R&D at Apple shows the company is developing products in several new categories, the analysts write.

data.title: Bank Of America: Apple Is Still An Innovator
data.text: Apple Inc. was granted 2,160 patents throughout 2018, suggesting the company's era of innovation is far from "dead," according to Bank of America Merrill Lynch.

data.title: Apple Stock Gets Price-Target Cut On Heightened U.S.-China Trade War
data.text: Rising trade tensions between the U.S. and China are likely to cut into Apple's profits, Wall Street analysts say.

data.title: The state of the smartphone
data.text: Earlier this month, Canalys used the word “freefall” to describe its latest reporting. Global shipments fell 6.8% year over year.

data.title: Apple shares fall as Instinet cuts stock price target on China trade tensions
data.text: Apple Inc. shares AAPL, slid 1.5% in premarket trade Friday, after Instinet lowered its stock price target to $175 from $180 citing concerns about China trade tensions.

data.title: The trade war will be a 'pain' for Apple's earnings, Nomura Instinet says, cutting estimates
data.text: Nomura Instinet lowered its price target on Apple shares, citing a coming "trade strain" on the company's earnings.
